title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 501.10 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 501.10 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice containing the title, business address and business
telephone number of the records access officer and appeals person, and the
location where records can be seen or copied, shall be posted in a conspicuous
location wherever records are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
501.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
